features.name: Echolocation
features.description: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

features.name: Hold Breath
features.description: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes

features.name: Keen Hearing
features.description: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) piercing damage.
